name: markdown-inline-editor-vscode
description: WYSIWYG inline markdown editor - hide syntax, focus on content
author: SeardnaSchmid

editor/title.when: editorLangId == markdown || editorLangId == md || editorLangId == mdx

markdownInlineEditor.defaultBehaviors.di.markdownDescription: Apply markdown decorations in diff views. Disabled by default to show raw syntax for easier review.

markdownInlineEditor.decorations.ghostFa.markdownDescription: Opacity of syntax markers when cursor is on a line (0.0-1.0).

markdownInlineEditor.decorations.codeBlo.description: Opacity for code block language identifiers
markdownInlineEditor.decorations.codeBlo.markdownDescription: Opacity of code block language identifiers (0.0-1.0).

markdownInlineEditor.links.singleClickOp.description: Open links and images with single click
markdownInlineEditor.links.singleClickOp.markdownDescription: Single-click to open links and image links (no Ctrl+Click needed). May interfere with text selection.

markdownInlineEditor.emojis.enabled.markdownDescription: Render emoji shortcodes (e.g., :smile:) inline in Markdown documents.

scripts.test:report: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest && echo 'HTML report generated at: dist/test-report/report.html'
scripts.copy:mermaid: mkdir -p assets/mermaid && cp node_modules/mermaid/dist/mermaid.esm.min.mjs assets/mermaid/ && cp node_modules/mermaid/dist/mermaid-*.js assets/mermaid/ 2>/dev/null; cp node_modules/mermaid/dist/*Diagram*.js assets/mermaid/ 2>/dev/null; cp node_modules/mermaid/dist/*-*.js assets/mermaid/ 2>/dev/null || true; if [ -d node_modules/mermaid/dist/chunks ]; then cp -r node_modules/mermaid/dist/chunks assets/mermaid/; fi
scripts.build: npm run copy:mermaid && npm run compile && npm run bundle:prod && npm run package
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run package
scripts.validate: npm run lint:docs && npm test && npm run build
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
